pages.text: $(li)The Refill enchantment can be applied in a Shulker Box and Useful Backpacks.$(br)$(li)Using an item or placing a block will use up the inventory of your Shulker Box insteat of your main inventory.$(br)$(li)This enchantment can be found Fishing or Trading with Villagers.
pages.title: Refill

pages.text: $(li)This enchantment can be found Fishing or Trading with Villagers.
